ScriptName ZUCABDesintegrationEffectSCR

Float Timer
Short DoOnce
Short IsPile

Begin ScriptEffectStart
	if getisid nvcrmrhouse == 0
	SetCriticalStage DisintegrateStart
	PMS ZUCABLaserCritGlowFXShader
	PMS ZUCABDesintegrationEffectShader01
	Set Timer to 1.8
	Set DoOnce to 0
	endif
End


Begin ScriptEffectUpdate
	If DoOnce == 0
		If IsPile == 0
			If Timer <= 0.5
				AttachAshPile
				Set IsPile to 1
			EndIf
		EndIf
		If Timer <= 0 
			SetCriticalStage DisintegrateEnd
			SMS ZUCABLaserCritGlowFXShader
			SMS ZUCABDesintegrationEffectShader01
			Set DoOnce to 1
		EndIf
		Set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed)
	EndIf
End

scn SSVFlamingEffectAshScript
Float Timer
Short DoOnce
float myAA
short isRobot

Begin ScriptEffectStart
	if GetDead == 1
		if GetIsCreatureType 6
			set isRobot to 1
			PMS LaserCritGlowFXShader
			PlaceAtMe SSVFireBurstBig 1
			PMS Flames01
			set Timer to 1.8
			set DoOnce to 0
		else
			set isRobot to 0
			PMS LaserCritGlowFXShader
			PMS effectLaserDisintegration
			PlaceAtMe SSVFireBurstBig 1
			SetCriticalStage DisintegrateStart
			PMS Flames01
			set Timer to 3.6
			set DoOnce to 0
		endif
	endif
	PMS Smoke01
End

Begin ScriptEffectUpdate
	if DoOnce == 0
		Set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed)
		if Timer < 0
			if isRobot
				set DoOnce to 3
				set Timer to 2.0
				SMS LaserCritGlowFXShader
			else
				set DoOnce to 1
				set Timer to 2.0
				SMS LaserCritGlowFXShader
				SMS effectLaserDisintegration
			endif
		endif
	endif
	if DoOnce == 1
		Set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed)
		if Timer < 0
			set DoOnce to 2
			set Timer to 1.0
			set myAA to 1
			AttachAshPile
			PlaceAtMe SSVFireBurst 1
		endif
	endif
	if DoOnce == 2
		Set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed)
		set myAA to myAA - GetSecondsPassed
		SAA myAA
		if Timer < 0
			set DoOnce to 5
			SetCriticalStage DisintegrateEnd
		endif
	endif
; Robots
	if DoOnce == 3
		Set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed)
		if Timer < 0
			set DoOnce to 4
			set Timer to 1.8
			PlaceAtMe SSVRobotExplosion 1
			PMS PulseDisableFXShader
			PMS Smoke02Pulse
		endif
	endif
	if DoOnce == 4
		Set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed)
		if Timer < 0
			set DoOnce to 5
			SMS PulseDisableFXShader
		endif
	endif
End

Begin ScriptEffectFinish
	SMS Smoke01
	SMS Smoke02Pulse
	SMS Flames01
End

scn SolarScorcherScript

int iChargeLevel
ref rContainer

float fTimer
float fChargePercent

float fSunlightRechargeCellSeconds

float fTimeOfDay
float fTimeVariableHolder

Begin GameMode
	if rContainer != GetContainer
		rContainer = GetContainer
	endif
	;the "container" may be an actual container, or an NPC holding the weapon.
	;printvar rContainer

	if rContainer.getequipped CFWRSolarScorcher == 1
		if rContainer.GetIsFormType NPC_
			if rContainer.HasPerk PerkSolarScorcherDamageController == 0
				;print "adding damage control perk"
				rContainer.addperk PerkSolarScorcherDamageController
			endif
		endif
		;this perk controls the damage at all times and interiors, so we can cut all of the perk adding and removing at certain times stuff
		;doing it this way, by getting the container, allows NPCs to use the weapon properly

		if TTWStartHourInstead == 1
		;TTW starts on an earlier day than the command checks for days since, so we have to specify the start date for TTW instead
			fTimeVariableHolder = GetGameDaysPassed 2277 8 18
		else
			fTimeVariableHolder = GetGameDaysPassed
		endif
		;printvar fTimeVariableHolder 
		;printvar fTimeOfDay 

		if fTimeOfDay != fTimeVariableHolder
		;if our stored time of day value doesn't equal the total days passed since the start date that we put in our variable holder above
			if fTimeOfDay == 0
			;if we're initializing fTimeOfDay for the first time, we do something different
				fTimeOfDay = fTimeVariableHolder
				;print "initializing"
			else
				if (fTimeVariableHolder - fTimeOfDay >= 0.0416)
				;if the days passed in fTimeVariableHolder is greater than one hour, give em all their ammo
					fTimeOfDay = fTimeVariableHolder 
					rContainer.additem AmmoSunlight ((GetWeaponClipRounds CFWRSolarScorcher) - rContainer.GetCurrentAmmoRounds) 1
					;print "adding max ammo, an hour has passed"
				endif
			endif
		endif


		if fSunlightRechargeCellSeconds != SunlightRechargeCellSeconds
			fSunlightRechargeCellSeconds = SunlightRechargeCellSeconds
			;printvar fSunlightRechargeCellSeconds 
		endif

		fTimer = fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
		;every time the script updates, it'll take the current timer value and add the amount of seconds since the script last run to it. this will be approximately 60 times per second at 60 fps.
		;printvar fTimer

		if fTimer >= 1
		;print "timer is equal or greater than 1"
		;wait for a full second to pass to do the ammo increase calc, rather than every frame
			if rContainer.isininterior == 1 || (GetCurrentTime < 5 || GetCurrenttime > 20)
			;if the actor is in an interior, or it's either past 20 hrs or before 5 hrs, do nothing
			;print "interior or night"
			elseif GetCurrentTime >= 5 && GetCurrentTime < 9 
			;if they're outside and it's later than 5 and earlier than 9
				;print "dawn"
				fChargePercent = fChargePercent + fTimer * 0.5 
				;printvar fChargePercent
			;iterate the charge percent by half if it's dawn and they're outside
			else
			;during ideal sunligh circumstances
				;print "day"
				fChargePercent = fChargePercent + fTimer *1
				;printvar fChargePercent
			endif
			fTimer = 0
			;printvar fTimer
			;reset the timer so that we count up to 1 again
		endif
		if fChargePercent >= fSunlightRechargeCellSeconds 
		;if our ongoing charge has reached or surpassed the threshold for a recharge
			if rContainer.GetCurrentAmmoRounds < GetWeaponClipRounds CFWRSolarScorcher
				fChargePercent = 0
				;zero out the charge value to start again
				rContainer.additem AmmoSunlight 1 1
				;the second 1 is for the "don't display ___ added message" flag
				rContainer.SetCurrentAmmoRounds (rContainer.GetCurrentAmmoRounds + 1)
				;increase the current clip round count, so that they don't need to reload
				;messageex "adding ammo"
				;print "adding ammo"
			endif
		endif

		iChargeLevel = rContainer.GetCurrentAmmoRounds
		;printvar iChargelevel

		If iChargeLevel == 0 
			SwapTexture rContainer DigitalDisplay "weapons\solarscorcher\digitaldisplay\00_g"
		EndIf

		If iChargeLevel == 1
			SwapTexture rContainer DigitalDisplay "weapons\solarscorcher\digitaldisplay\01_g"
		EndIf

		If iChargeLevel == 2
			SwapTexture rContainer DigitalDisplay "weapons\solarscorcher\digitaldisplay\02_g"
		EndIf

		If iChargeLevel == 3
			SwapTexture rContainer DigitalDisplay "weapons\solarscorcher\digitaldisplay\03_g"
		EndIf

		If iChargeLevel == 4
			SwapTexture rContainer DigitalDisplay "weapons\solarscorcher\digitaldisplay\04_g"
		EndIf

		If iChargeLevel == 5
			SwapTexture rContainer DigitalDisplay "weapons\solarscorcher\digitaldisplay\05_g"
		EndIf

		If iChargeLevel == 6
			SwapTexture rContainer DigitalDisplay "weapons\solarscorcher\digitaldisplay\06_g"
		EndIf

			SwapTexture rContainer DigitalDisplay "weapons\solarscorcher\digitaldisplay\07_g"

scn SCPTOnHitWithRock

ref rTarget
ref rWeapon
ref rAttacker

begin function {rTarget, rWeapon}
	if rTarget.GetArmourPenetrated == 1
		if rTarget.GetHitLocation == 1 || rTarget.GetHitLocation == 2 || rTarget.GetHitLocation == 13
			rAttacker = rTarget.GetHitAttacker
			if IsFormValid rAttacker == 1
				rAttacker.PushActorAway rTarget 1
			endif
		endif
	endif
end
This perk controls the solar scorcher's damage during certain times of day and in interiors.
Adds mid-range scope, with spotting laser.
